name: 6.16 "Yacht of Fools" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did Evan suggest that Sam take with him on the yacht?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Evan thought that Rebecca and Sam were an item because in a previous episode Rebecca pretended to be dating Sam. Sam had another woman in mind to go on the yacht with however.

questions.text: Who did Sam take on the yacht with him besides the person Evan suggested?
questions.explanation:
Julie.

	Julie was played by Dorothy Parke. She has appeared in a few movies including "Hot Shots" as Amanda Reed.

questions.text: Who did Evan think the woman Sam brought was?
questions.explanation:
Sam's sister.

	Rebecca told Sam to tell Evan that Julie was his sister who suddenly came into town. This made for some interesting events on the yacht.

questions.text: What profession was the woman Sam brought?
questions.explanation:
dental hygentist.

	Julie was very impressed by Evan's money. She told him his yacht must have cost a fortune.

questions.text: Why did Woody give six people a free drink?
questions.correct: He thought it was their birthday.
options: He was told to by Carla.
He was depressed and didn't care who he gave drinks to.
questions.explanation:
He thought it was their birthday.

	Two of the people that Woody gave a free drink to were Norm and Cliff. Only one person actually had a birthday; the rest lied to get the free beer.

questions.text: Who ended up hooking up with Evan?
questions.explanation:
Julie.

	Since Evan thought Julie was Sam's sister, they hooked up. However, it didn't work and Evan apologized to Sam for hitting on his sister.

questions.text: How did Rebecca describe the woman Sam brought?
questions.explanation:
a classic bimbo.

	Rebecca was upset with Julie for stealing Evan from her. Rebecca was planning to make her move on Evan that night on the yacht.

questions.text: Who did Sam attempt to hook up with when things didn't work out with the woman he brought?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	At first Rebecca was willing, but then Evan came in and apologized to Sam. Rebecca felt bad for Evan and told Sam no. She left the room for a bit and when she came back in, Sam was sleeping, or so it appeared. He tried to make a move on Rebecca and she shut his hand in the nightstand drawer.

questions.text: Who was upset with Norm and Cliff for tricking Woody?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla started to go after them so Norm said they should split up. Cliff said that Carla would come after him first. Norm agreed and ran away.

questions.text: Who did Sam end up with in the end of this episode (romantically speaking)?
questions.explanation:
No one.

	It didn't work out for anyone except for Julie. She ended up with one of the workers on the yacht.
